    • Method Detail

      • addRequestItem

        public java.lang.String addRequestItem(java.lang.String id,
                                       java.lang.String name,
                                       java.lang.String desc)
                                throws UserNotFoundException,
                                       AuthorizationException
        Makes this user request an item
        Parameters:
        id - trader id
        name - name of the item
        desc - description of the item
        Returns:
        the id
        Throws:
        UserNotFoundException - if the user was not found
        AuthorizationException - not allowed to request an item

      • addToWishList

        public java.lang.String addToWishList(java.lang.String traderId,
                                      java.lang.String itemId)
                               throws UserNotFoundException,
                                      AuthorizationException,
                                      TradableItemNotFoundException
        Adds an item to this trader's wishlist
        Parameters:
        traderId - the trader id
        itemId - the tradable item id to be added
        Returns:
        the traderId
        Throws:
        UserNotFoundException - if the trader with the given userId is not found
        AuthorizationException - not allowed to add to the wishlist
        TradableItemNotFoundException - the item wasn't found

      • removeFromWishList

        public java.lang.String removeFromWishList(java.lang.String traderId,
                                           java.lang.String itemId)
                                    throws UserNotFoundException,
                                           AuthorizationException
        Remove item from trader's wishlist
        Parameters:
        traderId - the trader
        itemId - the item being removed
        Returns:
        the trader id
        Throws:
        UserNotFoundException - if the trader isn't found
        AuthorizationException - frozen account or if the user can't do this action

      • removeFromInventory

        public java.lang.String removeFromInventory(java.lang.String traderId,
                                            java.lang.String itemId)
                                     throws UserNotFoundException,
                                            AuthorizationException
        Remove an item from the trader's inventory
        Parameters:
        traderId - the trader
        itemId - the item being removed
        Returns:
        the trader id
        Throws:
        UserNotFoundException - if the trader isn't found
        AuthorizationException - frozen account or if the user can't do this action

      • addReview

        public java.lang.String addReview(java.lang.String fromUser,
                                  java.lang.String toUser,
                                  double rating,
                                  java.lang.String message)
                           throws UserNotFoundException,
                                  AuthorizationException
        Adds a new review
        Parameters:
        fromUser - the user who sent the review
        toUser - the user who received the review
        rating - rating must be between 0 to 10, if greater or less than those bounds then it will assume those bounds
        message - the message of the review
        Returns:
        the new review id
        Throws:
        UserNotFoundException - if the user ids don't exist
        AuthorizationException - if the users aren't traders
